events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to their request for money back after receiving an incorrect product.
Assigning support agent John to handle the refund request for the incorrect order.
Hello! I'm John, here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund, I need the order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the item that was sent by mistake.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and the clear refund process. Thank you very much!
The refund request has been processed successfully, and the case is now resolved.
Checking in to confirm you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your experience.
Closing the customer support case as the refund was completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
